DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 4 , prospective , open-label , randomize study Greenlight XPS Laser versus BiVAP Saline Vaporization prostate men symptomatic Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) . The study consist screen phase , treatment , follow follow-up visit 1 week , 4 week , 3 month , 6 month , 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 4 Study Greenlight XPS Laser Versus BiVAP Saline Vaporization Prostate Men With Symptomatic Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: male age 18 year present symptomatic/ obstructive symptom secondary PBH require surgical intervention subject must read , understand sign Informed Consent AUA ≥ 15 Qmax < 15mL/sec Stopped BPH medication . Alpha blockers 15 day 5αreductase 3 month Prostate volume ≥ 30g PVR > 300ml Current urine retention Previous surgical invasive treatment ( TURP , TUMT , TUNA ) PSA ≥ 4 ( must negative biopsy within last 12 month ) Neurogenic bladder Obstruction due urethral stricture Any disorder condition subject investigator believe counter indicate inclusion study
